attributes.action: Spend an extra £350m a week on the NHS
attributes.additional_details: As the UK has voted to leave the EU, the government should now commit to spending an extra £350,000,000 a week on the NHS, in addition to its current budget. This should come into effect immediately after the UK has receded from the EU.
attributes.background: During the EU referendum the UK's EU membership bill was widely quoted as being £350,000,000 a week. It was suggested that if the UK voted to leave the EU that money could be spent on the NHS instead.
